Module rrpss
Package invoice

Class InvoiceMgr

java.lang.Object
invoice.InvoiceMgr
public class InvoiceMgr extends Object
The control class of invoice entities. Contains the list of invoices. For information on each invoice in the list, please visit invoice
Author:
Trevor

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    InvoiceMgr()
    When instantiating this manager, it will create a list of invoices

    Method
    Description
    int
    currentSize()
    Gets the current number of invoices in the list

    generateSalesReport()
    This generates the sales report for the current month, comprising the invoices created in this month, together with their order contents and the total revenue for this period

    This generates the sales report for a certain period, comprising the invoices created in this period, together with their order contents and the total revenue for this period

  • Constructor Details

    • InvoiceMgr

      public InvoiceMgr()
      When instantiating this manager, it will create a list of invoices

  • Method Details

    • generateSalesReport

      public void generateSalesReport()
      This generates the sales report for the current month, comprising the invoices created in this month, together with their order contents and the total revenue for this period

    • generateSalesReport

      public void generateSalesReport​(String str, String s)
      This generates the sales report for a certain period, comprising the invoices created in this period, together with their order contents and the total revenue for this period
      Parameters:
      str - The start date for which to include invoices
      s - The end date for which to include invoices

    • isExists

      public boolean isExists​(int invId)
      Checks if an invoice for a given ID exists.
      Parameters:
      invId - The ID for which to check if an invoice exists for
      Returns:
      True if the invoice exists, False otherwise.

    • currentSize

      public int currentSize()
      Gets the current number of invoices in the list
      Returns:
      The number of invoices in the list

    • newInvoice

      public void newInvoice​(Order ord, boolean isMember)
      Creates a new invoice for a specific order. Also applies the appropriate discount (10% if they are a member)
      Parameters:
      ord - The order for which this invoice will be created for
      isMember - Whether the customer is a member

    • printInvoice

      public void printInvoice​(int invoiceId)
      Prints the invoice if it exists
      Parameters:
      invoiceId - The ID for which to print the invoice

    • save

      public void save()
      Saves the invoices in the list to a file that can be stored even if the system has shut down

    • load

      public void load()
      Loads the invoices that have been previously saved to a file
